item.description:
Join us for SOWA First Friday!

As usual, we'll meet at Boston Sculptors Gallery, stay there until about 6:30 (to give you a bit of a time cushion), and then wander down Harrison.

If you RSVP maybe, please remember to update it closer to the date. This helps me know who to expect. It's also extremely helpful to add a photo that looks like you to your profile.

As always, let me know if you have questions or comments.

-Cristin


P.S. Parking is on the street and the nearest T station is Back Bay--about a 15 minute walk.
item.how_to_find_us: Look like my photo + will be carrying a bright green bag with a hula girl on it
item.name: South End First Friday
